reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Excellent professor! She explains concepts very clearly and is always available for help.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Great lectures, but sometimes moves too quickly through material.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Average experience. The lectures were fine, but the exams were much harder than expected.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Not very engaging. The lectures were dry and difficult to follow.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Amazing professor! She made the subject interesting and was always supportive.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Good professor, but assignments were a bit too challenging.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Very thought-provoking lectures. I really enjoyed this class.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Decent professor, but not very approachable outside of class.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Incredible professor! She made complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Good course content, but the lectures could be more engaging.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Not a bad professor, but I found the course material somewhat boring.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! The projects were challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Enjoyable class, but sometimes the reading load was too heavy.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: One of the best professors I've had. The lectures were fascinating.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: The lectures were okay, but the exams were tricky.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Struggled to keep up with the pace of the course. Not very approachable.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Fantastic course! The professor was very knowledgeable and passionate.

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Good professor, but the grading was tougher than expected.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Absolutely loved this class! The professor was inspiring.

reviews.review: The lectures were okay, but I had a hard time with the assignments.
